title: Add 67 Clicker game based on the Six Seven meme

requirements.summary: Build an in-browser '67 Clicker' game using React and canvas, themed around the 'six seven' meme with click scoring, combo multipliers, localStorage best score persistence, and dark neon arcade styling
acceptanceCriteria: A canvas-based clicker game component (SixSevenGame.tsx) is created in frontend/src/components/games/
A large clickable '67' / six-seven meme character is rendered in the center of the canvas
Each click increments the score and triggers a '67!' floating text effect with a flash/shake animation
A combo multiplier increases score when clicks occur within a short time window and resets after ~1 second of inactivity
Current score and best score are both displayed prominently; best score persists in localStorage
The character shows a pulsing idle animation when not being clicked
The game uses the platform's dark neon arcade theme: near-black background, neon accent colors, Orbitron typography, neon glow effects

file_operations.description: Create a canvas-based clicker game component that renders a large '67' character in the center with click detection. Implement score tracking with each click incrementing the score and triggering a '67!' floating text effect with flash/shake animation. Add combo multiplier logic that increases when clicks occur within a short time window (~500ms) and resets after ~1 second of inactivity. Display current score and best score prominently using Orbitron typography with neon glow effects. Persist best score in localStorage using a key like 'sixSevenBestScore'. Implement a pulsing idle animation on the '67' character when not being clicked. Style with the platform's dark neon arcade theme: near-black background (#0a0a0f), neon accent colors (electric yellow #ffff00, hot-pink #ff10f0), and neon glow effects consistent with existing games like TungTungGame.tsx. Use canvas for rendering the character, animations, and floating score effects.

requirements.summary: Register the 67 Clicker game in the game routing map in GamePage.tsx so navigating to its slug renders SixSevenGame and increments play count
acceptanceCriteria: GamePage.tsx includes an entry in its game routing map that maps the slug for '67 Clicker' to the SixSevenGame component
Navigating to /game/67-clicker (or equivalent slug) renders the SixSevenGame component
The play count is incremented via the backend on mount

file_operations.description: Add an entry to the gameComponents mapping object that maps the slug '67-clicker' to the SixSevenGame component. Import SixSevenGame from '../components/games/SixSevenGame'. The existing GamePage logic will automatically handle rendering the component when the URL matches /game/67-clicker and will increment the play count via the useIncrementPlayCount mutation on mount, matching the pattern used for other games.

requirements.summary: Add the 67 Clicker game to the seed games list in seedGames.ts with title, description, category 'Clicker', and thumbnail filename so it appears in the game library
acceptanceCriteria: seedGames.ts includes an entry for '67 Clicker' with title, description, category 'Clicker', and thumbnail filename
The 67 Clicker game card appears in the game library on the homepage after seeding
The seed function correctly adds the game to the backend if it is missing

file_operations.description: Add a new game object to the seedGames array with title '67 Clicker', a short description referencing the six seven meme (e.g., 'Click the iconic six seven meme to rack up points! Build combos with rapid clicks and chase the ultimate high score.'), category 'Clicker', and thumbnail 'frontend/public/assets/generated/67-clicker.dim_256x256.png'. The existing seedGames function will automatically add this game to the backend via the addGame mutation if it doesn't already exist, making it appear in the game library on the homepage.
